## More code! Mind `Dump`! Using `prism-react-renderer`: ```jsx let intro = [] let stanza1 = [ "Home is where the wind fills our sails.", "Although many don't sail away from here.", "With a lake much like the sea", "Sailing what we've already seen.", "While we wait for our ship to come and take us away", "Well we've got many days before we go!" ] let chorus = [ "Moon pies filled with singly sweet creams", "Dreams already made for you and me", "So I'll see you when I wake up", "But fever dreams have taken over me" ] let stanza2 = [ "So decorate our time like it's makeup", "Music and Patron for the bros", "We're getting collared up", "Walk into the pub like it's a stickup", "Play a couple games of pool, hold up", "Hit the store to get our stomachs filled up" ] const Dump = (props) => (
{Object.entries(props).map(([key, val]) => ( 
        
          {key} ðŸ’©
        
        {JSON.stringify(val, '', ' ')}
))}
) render() ```
